name: Hellenic Petroleum Group of Companies
goal: Hellenic Petroleum S.A. is the largest industrial and commercial company in Greece and one of the leading energy groups in SE Europe, with presence in 6 countries. Its activities span across the energy value chain and consist of: refining & marketing, petrochemicals, oil & gas exploration & production, power generation & trading, natural gas and renewable energy sources.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
